name: Rocket Buddy
description:
You have a cannon loaded with Buddies, and your goal is to get to the target. Solve puzzling challenges, avoid obstacles, and use as many Buddies as you need to complete every level.

The game features your favorite ragdoll physics, hilarious challenges, and endless fun!

We Love You! Enjoy!
